title: Borlotti and rosemary ragù with leeks and garlic crumbs
description: A sprinkling of crisp garlic croûtons adds something special to this comforting bean stew. This is designed to be a low cost recipe.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 x 400g/14oz tins borlotti beans, drained and rinsed
500ml/18fl oz vegetable or chicken stock (made from a cube)
200g/7oz sliced bread (stale bread is fine), crust removed
